subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mikko Koivu scored the lone goal in a shootout Friday night to give the Minnesota Wild a 3-2 victory against the visiting Anaheim Ducks and the best record in the Western Conference.
snippet: Mikko Koivu scored the lone goal in a shootout Friday night to give the Minnesota Wild a 3-2 victory against the visiting Anaheim Ducks and the best record in the Western Conference.
